casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Hermenegildo R. MARTINEZ. No. 94P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 6, 2008. Catherine F. Jordan, Assistant Attorney General, Ronald L. Moore, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2008 by Defendant for a Discretionary Review:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of March 2008."
